API.Comments: Initializes a new instance of this class.
Binds the channel's socket to a local address.

API.Function: connect(SocketAddress remote, A attachment, CompletionHandler<Void,? super A> handler)

API.Comments: Returns the socket address that this channel's socket is bound to.
Returns the remote address to which this channel's socket is connected.
Returns the provider that created this channel.
Reads a sequence of bytes from this channel into the given buffer.
API.Function: read(ByteBuffer[] dsts,int offset,int length,long timeout,TimeUnit unit,A attachment,CompletionHandler<Long,? super A> handler)

API.Comments: Reads a sequence of bytes from this channel into a subsequence of the given buffers.
API.Function: read(ByteBuffer dst,long timeout,TimeUnit unit,A attachment,CompletionHandler<Integer,? super A> handler)

API.Comments: Reads a sequence of bytes from this channel into the given buffer.
API.Function: read(ByteBuffer dst,A attachment,CompletionHandler<Integer,? super A> handler)

API.Comments: Reads a sequence of bytes from this channel into the given buffer.
Sets the value of a socket option.
Shutdown the connection for reading without closing the channel.
Shutdown the connection for writing without closing the channel.
Writes a sequence of bytes to this channel from the given buffer.
API.Function: write(ByteBuffer[] srcs, int offset, int length, long timeout, TimeUnit unit, A attachment, CompletionHandler<Long,? super A> handler)

API.Comments: Writes a sequence of bytes to this channel from a subsequence of the given buffers.
API.Function: write(ByteBuffer src, long timeout, TimeUnit unit, A attachment, CompletionHandler<Integer,? super A> handler)

API.Comments: Writes a sequence of bytes to this channel from the given buffer.
API.Function: write(ByteBuffer src, A attachment, CompletionHandler<Integer,? super A> handler)
